Producer: Rachael Horovitz, Gary Foster, Nitsa Benchetrit, David C. Barrot
Production Co: Cohen Media Group, Katsize Films, Deux Chevaux
Synopsis: A New Yorker (Kevin Kline) discovers that the vast Paris apartment he inherited from his estranged father is already occupied by a refined retiree (Maggie Smith) and her protective daughter (Kristin Scott-Thomas).
Title: My Old Lady
